alert.note: Alert for Catoosa; Dade; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 8:33PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Gusty winds will impact portions of west central Catoosa, western Walker and Dade Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 832 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong winds ahead of a line of weakening thunderstorms along a line extending from near Powells Crossroads to near Horton, and moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind preceding rain or lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Fort Oglethorpe, Rossville, Chickamauga, Lookout Mountain, Chattanooga Valley, Rising Fawn, Cole City, Wildwood, Fairview, Stephensville, Chattanooga Valley, New England, Morganville, Hooker, Cloudland Canyon State Park and Cooper Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately.
